message: I'm excited to sell you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $110?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested in the product, but $110 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. Would you be willing to do $95?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105, though. Would you be interested in that price?
